| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 11 | 9, 10, 1, 3, 4 | #P_lkr0f | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ G e. F ) -> ( ( K ` G ) = V <-> G = ( V X. { ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) } ) ) ) |

| 18 | 1, 9, 10, 2, 3, 4 | #P_lkrshp | |- ( ( W e. LVec /\ G e. F /\ G =/= ( V X. { ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` W ) ) } ) ) -> ( K ` G ) e. H ) |
